```dart
import 'package:sui/sui.dart';

// 12 mnemonics are generated by default
final mnemonic = SuiAccount.generateMnemonic();
// strength: 128 -> 12 mnemonic, 
//           160 -> 15 mnemonic, 
//           192 -> 18 mnemonic, 
//           224 -> 21 mnemonic, 
//           256 -> 24 mnemonic
final mnemonic = SuiAccount.generateMnemonic(strength: 160);
```
?
```dart
import 'package:sui/utils/hex.dart';

// create account
// scheme: SignatureScheme.Secp256k1
//         SignatureScheme.Secp256r1, 
//         SignatureScheme.ED25519
var account = SuiAccount.fromMnemonics(mnemonic, SignatureScheme.Secp256k1);
// create account with private key 
account = SuiAccount.fromPrivateKey(account.privateKeyHex(), SignatureScheme.Secp256k1);
// address
account.getAddress();
// privateKey
account.privateKeyHex();
// publicKey
Hex.encode(account.getPublicKey());
```
?
```dart
import 'package:sui/sui.dart';
import 'package:sui/types/faucet.dart';

SuiAccount account; // you need create one
// query balance
// Constants.testnetAPI or Constants.devnetAPI
final suiClient = SuiClient(Constants.devnetAPI);
final coinBalance = await suiClient.getBalance(account.getAddress());
final balance = coinBalance.totalBalance;

// request faucet
// Constants.faucetTestAPI or Constants.faucetDevAPI
final faucet = FaucetClient(Constants.faucetDevAPI);
// Faucet
await faucet.requestSuiFromFaucetV1(account.getAddress());
```
?
```dart
final account = SuiAccount.fromMnemonics(mnemonics, SignatureScheme.ED25519);
final client = SuiClient(Constants.devnetAPI);

final tx = TransactionBlock();
tx.setGasBudget(BigInt.from(20000000));
final coin = tx.splitCoins(tx.gas, [tx.pureInt(1000)]);
tx.transferObjects(
    [coin],
    tx.pureAddress(account.getAddress())
);

final result = await client.signAndExecuteTransactionBlock(account, tx);
print(result.digest);
```
